pages.text: The crocodile it's a long green body covered in scales with a sharp teeth mouth creature that it likes to live in the Swamps and Rivers.$(br2)They are hostile, but you can bred them with Rotten Flesh. After breeding, Crocodiles will come ashore to lay their eggs.$(br2)When a baby crocodile becomes an adult or on the death of an Adult Crocodile, they may drop
$(br)Crocodile Scutes. Those can be used to create a $(l:patchouli:armors/crocodile_chestplate)Crocodile Chestplate$(/l).
